data.comment: The match is underway in Moscow.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 2, Bernard Berisha (Akhmat Grozny) has received a yellow card from Evgeni Turbin.
Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha is whistled for offside at Otkritie Arena.
Evgeni Turbin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Evgeni Turbin signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Akhmat Grozny needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 9, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 10, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 13, Akhmat Grozny pushes forward through Ismael Silva, whose finish on goal is saved.
Zoran Nizic is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Zoran Nizic for Akhmat Grozny is back on the field again.
In the minute 19, Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
Spartak Moscow's Ayrton Lucas misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Akhmat Grozny drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 23, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
At Otkritie Arena, Anton Shvets has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Jordan Larsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Aleksandr Sobolev's header is off-target for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 31, Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 33, Spartak Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 35, Ayrton Lucas hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Spartak Moscow!
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Moscow.
Evgeni Turbin awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Otkritie Arena.
Evgeni Turbin awards the away team a throw-in.
Jordan Larsson (Spartak Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 37, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Evgeny Kharin for Akhmat Grozny has been booked by Evgeni Turbin and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 39, Akhmat Grozny drives forward and Vladimir Iljin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 40, Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Akhmat Grozny's Ismael Silva has been booked in Moscow.
Alex Kral for Spartak Moscow has been booked by Evgeni Turbin and receives a first yellow card.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Ismael Silva with Andres Ponce.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Akhmat Grozny's half?
In the minute 45, At Otkritie Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Spartak Moscow's Alex Kral breaks free at Otkritie Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
In Moscow Spartak Moscow attack through Nail Umyarov. The finish is off target, however.
Evgeni Turbin awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Akhmat Grozny's Andres Ponce gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Evgeni Turbin blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Andres Ponce (Akhmat Grozny) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 46, In Moscow, Vladimir Iljin (Akhmat Grozny) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Evgeni Turbin signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Akhmat Grozny's area.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 48, Evgeni Turbin awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 50, Andrey Semenov is booked for the away team.
An attacking Spartak Moscow player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Jordan Larsson converts the penalty to give Spartak Moscow a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 55, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nail Umyarov.
In the minute 57, Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Spartak Moscow’s Nail Umyarov is on his feet again at Otkritie Arena.
Bernard Berisha (Akhmat Grozny) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 58, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Evgeni Turbin signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Akhmat Grozny's area.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 60, Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Aleksandr Sobolev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Akhmat Grozny defender.
Odise Roshi is on a sub for Evgeny Kharin for Akhmat Grozny.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Lechii Sadulaev is replacing Zoran Nizic for Akhmat Grozny at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 64, Andrey Talalaev is making the team's fourth substitution at Otkritie Arena with Aleksandr Putsko replacing Vladimir Iljin.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 68, Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov (Akhmat Grozny) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Spartak Moscow take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Ezequiel Ponce.
Aleksandr Sobolev instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 71, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Otkritie Arena, Miroslav Bogosavac has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 75, The home team have replaced Nail Umyarov with Andrey Eshchenko. This is the first substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
Spartak Moscow are pushing forward but Roman Zobnin's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 77, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Evgeni Turbin awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Arsen Adamov is replacing Bernard Berisha for the away team.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Domenico Tedesco (Spartak Moscow) is making a second substitution, with Zelimkhan Bakaev replacing Jordan Larsson.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 86, Roman Zobnin (Spartak Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow make their third substitution with Maksim Glushenkov replacing Ezequiel Ponce.
In the minute 89, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In Moscow Spartak Moscow's Maksim Glushenkov is caught offside.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Moscow, Maksim Glushenkov of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Ayrton Lucas gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Akhmat Grozny defender.
Ayrton Lucas of Spartak Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Evgeni Turbin signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Moscow. The final score is 2-0.
Akhmat Grozny's Odise Roshi has been booked in Moscow.
